name: Guardian Gnome Pin
description:
Just a wee little gnome to wear on you collar (or bag, or backpack) to bring you good luck!  Five different gnomes to choose from, each with witty little descriptions of their magical powers.

	Now you can have your kitsch (and wear it too!) Collect them all!

	Size: about 3 inches tall. 1/2 inch pin glued to back with industrial strength adhesive.  Your gnome will arrive sweetly packaged and is shipped in a sturdy box for safe travel.

name: Guardian Gnome Magnet Set
description:
Just the perfect gift for all of you gnome fans out there! A little terra cotta pot with four lucky gnomes, nestled in paper shred, and gift-wrapped in a cellophane bag tied with polka dot ribbon and a wee mushroom. Perfect stocking stuffers or housewarming gifts, these magical little magnets are sure to please.

	Extra-strong circle magnets are affixed to plastic gnomes with industrial strength adhesive. Gnomes measure about 2 and 1/4 inches tall.

	*Gnome and mushroom styles, colors and sizes will vary, but all sets are adorable!
